name: Studio VOXYZ
short: The official Studio VOXYZ community server!
long: Studio VOXYZ is a singing voice synthesis project managed by MystSaphyr, with Kikyuune Aiko as its primary voicebank and mascot. Our community is built around a shared love for all things vocalsynth: from VOCALOID to UTAU, CeVIO to SynthV, DeepVocal to NEUTRINO and absolutely everything in between!

name: Snowy Touhou RP Server
short: Touhou Roleplay Server
long: A server I made for Touhou roleplays. Why is it Snowy? Because I'm a snowball. My vision for the server is that we'll have a fun time roleplaying together there while maintaining a real degree of quality and effort, and that it can be a place that lifts people up and makes their lives better and greater. I try not to take the server overly seriously and be a stick in the mud, and I don't stick too strictly to Touhou lore. May you enjoy yourself here if you give it a shot.

name: The Hive
short: A Drug Discussion Server!
long: The Hive was a website that served as an information-sharing forum for individuals and groups interested in the practical synthesis, chemistry, biology, politics, and legal aspects of mind or body-altering drugs. Participants ranged from pure theorists to self-declared organized crime chemists (claimed to be retired but with excellent connections) as well as forensic chemists, who (much like their quarries) used the Hive to keep abreast of developments in clandestine chemistry. At its peak, the Hive had thousands of participants from all over the world.
